DOC.brief_summary: The E-MECHANIC Ancillary Study measure change 24-hour energy expenditure spontaneous physical activity subset 60 obese individual enrol main study . We aim determine change energy metabolism might explain people n't lose expected amount weight exercise program .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Exercise-Induced Weight Loss Energy Metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: This ancillary study E-Mechanic , National Institutes Health study 198 individual objective understand certain people fail lose weight exercise program . In E-Mechanic change body weight , body composition , energy intake energy expenditure measure 3 different exercise program 24 week duration . The 3 exercise program compare self-directed exercise , low dose exercise high dose exercise . The goal ancillary study undertake comprehensive assessment energy metabolism metabolic chamber group 60 obese individual enrol main study . We compare difference change 24h energy expenditure spontaneous physical activity 3 exercise program . We also test change energy metabolism might explain people n't lose expected amount weight 24 week exercise .
DOC.criteria: Individuals enrol EMECHANIC main study ( NCT # 01264406 ) body mass index ( BMI ) great equal 30 kg/m2 . Not enrolled EMECHANIC main study ( NCT # 01264406 ) . Have body mass index ( BMI ) less 30 kg/m2 .
